forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early then fog developing overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off early with foggy conditions overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 58F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 11C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 19C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 66F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 45F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 11C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 53F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 6C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 43F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 5C. NNE winds shifting to SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear in the evening. Increasing clouds with showers after midnight. Low 42F. NNE winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 10C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 50F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low near 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
